name: Raster
title: raster.app
shortDescription: Raster is a digital asset manager tailored for modern teams focused on photography management. It streamlines the process of organizing, editing, and hosting photos, enhancing team performance with its fast DAM capabilities. Ideal for marketing, design, and engineering teams, Raster transforms a typical 25-minute photo management task into a swift 30-second operation, eliminating the need for traditional folder-based storage with its AI-driven tagging system.
cons: May be overly complex for small teams
Potential high cost for full features
Limited to photo management, not general assets

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: Bynder
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Focus on brand and media asset management

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: Canto
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Simplified DAM for various media types
